content:
Chandu Sekhar 

 

 

 

 

Senior Systems Analyst (​Scientist ‘C’​) 
 

Andhra Pradesh State Centre,  

Hyderabad 

 

TECHNICAL SUMMARY 

 

A Senior Systems Analyst with a proven track record of progressive management            

experience, team leadership and techNICal skills. Strong business and techNICal          

vision with effective people skills to allow close work with senior management. Ability             

to manage multiple complex projects for internal and external customers. A team            

builder who motivates staff using a proactive management style. 

 

TECHNICAL SKILLS 

● Public Key Infrastructure (PKI), Development of Components to access         
Common Access Cards (CACs) Card Readers, X.509 Certificate Policy 

● Internet / Intranet Application Development (.NET Framework, ASP.NET,        
ADO.NET, C#, Ajax, Web Services, XML ,ASP, HTML, JavaScript, CSS) 

● Database Administration (SQL Server) 

● Web server Administration (IIS),  

● Graphic Content Management & Graphic Design (Adobe tools) 
 

 

CURRENT POSITION and EXPERIENCE 

 

Senior Systems Analyst (​Scientist ‘C’​)  
ABC  

Andhra Pradesh State Centre,  

Hyderabad 

 

 

As a Senior Systems Analyst   I am  

  

● Experienced in Designing Dotnet Components for Digital Signing and 
Verification of Signed Data, Design and Development of Internet / Intranet 

application development Experienced in code writing and creating jobs to 

automate repetitive tasks (Database Administration, SP’s)  

● Experienced in Web Servers (IIS) & Database Servers (Sql Server Series) 
administration 

● Experienced in Site content Design and decision making on each site’s content 
flow and graphic content 

● Experienced in development of custom portal template websites for 
organizations that need guidance and direction in the website design process 

● Experienced in Custom-tailored Application Development 
● Well trained in providing consultation on ASP, IIS & SQL Server 
● Experienced in troubleshooting various performance Issues 
 

Experience Summary 

 

● Design and Development of Digital Signature web-plugin Component 
 

● Background: 
 



o In Government, Internet Kiosk operators provide citizen services such         

as issuing records and receipts for citizens 

o In the Internet Kiosk , the operator connects to a web application            

served from a government data center that shows the data that goes            

into the record or receipt in a web UI 

o The record is then printed out and provided to the citizen who usually             

pays for it and takes it home. 

o These records and receipts may need to be re-issued later to citizens            

or when a citizen brings such a record/receipt to an authority, its            

authenticity must be verified to ensure that it is not tampered 

● Requirement 
o To ensure authenticity a digital signature is usually required to be           

generated on the record/receipt and stored in a central database          

against the record/receipt 

o The signature needs to be linked to certificates and optionally connect           

to smartcards protected by PINs where the signature keys are stored 

o Signatures need to be verified by an authority/individual on demand 

● Gap 
o Since these signatures are to be generated from the browser, there is            

no readily available OOB component in the platform by which the           

signing can be done or the linking to certificates/smart cards is done 

o However support exists in Win32 and .NET for generating these          

signatures and verifying them 

 

● Digital Signature web-plugin Component 
 

o A Digital Signature Web-Plugin Component has been Designed and 

Developed for creating and verifying digital signatures wrapped by a 

web control that could be a java_script callable COM/ActiveX wrapper.  

 

o As the  .NET Platform support for crypto signing/verifying/smartcards 

is comprehensive  usage of existing classes and adding or configuring 

existing  dotnet classes is preferred to build the component using the 

X509 Certificate Standards 

 

● Designed and Developed an online  Application  titled “Integrated Student 
Survey”  for managing repository of Student Data of Andhra Pradesh, and 

then providing an ​online tool for Digitally signing and Verification​ of the 
Data on Demand. This digitally signed data is then exposed to 3​rd​ party 
authorized applications through Secured Webservices thereby enabling the 

verification and printing of Digitally Signed Data. 

 

● Cyberabad Plc Online Case Status Information System 
A dynamic Web based Management Information System for Monitoring all          

the Cases Filed under Cyberabad Plc Commissionerate has been designed          

and developed by me. Cases registered under each Plc Station are being            

captured onto the central server for further analysis. Role based access           

mechanism has been incorporated to facilitate transparency. The application         

works over Closed User Group environment. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

● Official Website of HCTF  
 

A dynamic website for HCTP has been designed and developed by me. This is              

considered to be one of the most popular and most frequently visited            

websites in Hyderabad City. Most important Dynamic Feature of this website           

is “Live Traffic Information / Alerts” flushed onto the site at regular            



intervals, which helps the commuters to know the live traffic status.           

Information at regular intervals is fed onto the site by a team of Plc              

Personnel through a Streamlined CMS developed specifically to Hyderabad         

Traffic Plc. These Alerts also form a base for various FM Channels to             

broadcast the latest traffic information through their respective Radio         

Channels. 

 

 

● Official Website of HCP  
The official website of HCP has been designed, developed and hosted on NIC             

servers. A dynamic website designed to bridge the gap between common           

citizen and the Plc department has won great accolades and is recognized as             

one the most viewed websites in Andhra Pradesh. Features such as Whats            

up Today, ADDA, How Do I, huge information related to Crimes, Frauds,            

Terror etc have been incorporated. Services such as Passport Verification          

Status, Plc Clearance Certificate, Foreigners Online Registration, Stolen        

Mobiles and Vehicle information etc., has won great appreciation from          

common citizens​. 
 

● Monitoring of RTI Cases for Hyderabad Plc Commissionerate 
 

A dynamic web Application for Monitoring of RTI Cases for Hyderabad Plc 

Commissionerate has been designed and developed by me. The application 

allows to feed all the RTI cases along with information such as due date etc. 

Further this allows an option to Mark the case to concerned official with a 

predefined Due Date. The application sends automated alerts to notify the 

pendency. 

 

 

Other Important Projects :  

 

● Official Website of Cyberabad Plc  
● Designed and Developed Petition and Task Monitoring System for Hyderabad 

and Cyberabad Plc Commissionerates 

● Worked on key modules of e-hospital, a complete Online generalized solution 
for hospitals- ABC, Andhra Pradesh State Unit, Hyderabad

Challenges
· To manage Asset Recovery branches effectively and efficiently. 

· Ensuring that all the N P A accounts are under SARFAESI proceedings.
· Liquidating assets through e-Auction within the reasonable team.
· Driving Compromise Proposals and One Time Settlement offers periodically in order to reduce the absolute amount. 
· To coordinate with the Branch managers and also Divisional Operating Officers stationed at each Divisional Office.
· Timely submission of MISs to the senior management.

· Being part of Committee of Creditors [CoC] and attending all the consortium meetings where the cases have been referred to N C L T [National Company Law Tribunal] and CIRP [Corporate Insolvency Resolution Process] has been initiated. 
Notable Achievements

· Asset Recovery Management branch was first opened in Hyderabad. Basing on its success the bank had taken steps in opening few more ARBs across the country. 
· Within 4 months of its opening, 25 Cores of N P A had been reduced from N P A portfolio.

Company:

Kotak Mahindra Bank Ltd [Post ING Vysya Bank merger with KOTAK BANK]
Period: 


11th Dec’06 till 23rd Jan'17
Designation: 

VP & Regional Manager – Debt Management.

Products Handled
Mortgages, Personal Loans, Commercial Vehicle Loans, Auto Loans, Two Wheeler Loans and Business Banking Accounts [SME Loans].
Key  Deliverables/Tasks
· Lead and manage the team of Managers who are responsible for the collections/recoveries in their respective products.[SME, Mortgages, Unsecured Loans, Commercial Vehicle loans, Auto & TW loans].
· Delinquency management - Develop strategies to minimize delinquencies, achieve targets , to keep the costs under control and to liaise with the legal team.
· Periodically liaise with credit & sales team and to give the feedback on the performance of the portfolio.

· Keep the delinquency stock under control, to reduce the N P A stock and keep provisioning within the budgeted limits.

· Recruiting & Reviewing the collections agencies periodically and monitor their performance.

· Customer complaints, Audit and Process compliance.

Challenges & Achievements

· The foremost challenge at the time of joining the bank [ING] during the year 2006 was to handle disorganized recovery process with a clear message of reducing the N P A stock across products.
· Direct reporting team of 19 Managers [AP & West Regions] with the vintage staff of 6 members who had put up minimum of 25 years of service in the Bank – Big challenge to gain the confidence of vintage staff and bringing them on the same platform with a common collections objective. 
· Two big regions AP & West under my belt with the book of close to 2500 Crores in 2006.
·  Spearheaded collections activities in the regions in both Secured and Unsecured Loans.
· Reengineered the collection process and improved efficiency levels.
· Identified and appointed debt recovery agencies and also recruited required full time product managers.
· Exhibited best Team Work - Lead, motivated and mentored all the team members and enhanced productivity and collection objectives.

· Within a span of 1year 4 months of joining in 2006, N P A stock was reduced from 15 Crs to 5 Crs in AP.
· Curtailed further flows to N P A with regular follow ups and maintaining continuous liaison with various vendors and also with all the team members at various locations across both the regions.
· Extensive travel to all the locations enabled me to have total control not only on the team’s involvement /performance levels but also on the portfolio at micro level.
· Conceptualized and implemented process modifications to enhance operational efficiency and also optimized resource utilization. 

· Well achieved the key deliverable which is N P A reduction and curtail flows by ensuring the NPA budgets and provisioning cost well under control. 
· Collections Cost – Always under the budgeted provisions. 
· Had been proactive in preventing frauds creeping into the system. Always kept a hawkish eye on the business proposals logging into the system and also ensure frequent visits to FI and RCU agencies.

·  Continuously analyzed and shared the ideas / suggestions to upgrade the Collections MIS that had been backbone in effective management of collection activities.

· Developing process for prompt customer centric services.
· Providing continuous feedback to risk and credit teams in redefining portfolio norms and criteria for customer selections visa a vis. demographic segmentations.

· Ensured bank policies & compliance is adhered by having proper checks and controls with self audit mechanism that has driven the team to “Satisfied” Audit rating year on year..  
· Adopted various risks mitigating tools and enhancing recovery numbers with the proper utilization of legal tools.  

· Write off recovery till date has been 30% of the total written off book which is straight to the bottom line of the balance sheet.
· Since 2014 handled only AP region with an additional responsibility of handling delinquent business banking accounts.
· Big opportunity to handle delinquent and N P A accounts [Rs 32 Crs of N P A ] of SME business [Rs 3,200 Book as of March'16 - AP].
Other Notable Achievements
·    Joined the bank as Asst VP during Dec’06 and was promoted as Associate VP with grade elevation  

   in May’08. Currently designated as Vice President in the joint entity.
·    Successfully lead both the regions [AP&West] to overseas trip 3 times by winning the contest with steep targets to be Achieved. Had pride of visiting countries abroad 5 times.
·    Additional responsibility of West Region along with AP region from March’08 to March’14. 
·    Additional responsibility added to my portfolio i.e handling business banking accounts [SME loans].
